text: This is a list of colleges and universities in New Mexico: ==Public== *Central New Mexico Community College *Clovis Community College *Din√© College *Eastern New Mexico University *Institute of American Indian Arts *Mesalands Community College *New Mexico Highlands University *New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology *New Mexico Military Institute *New Mexico State University *Northern New Mexico College *Santa Fe Community College *San Juan College *University of New Mexico *Western New Mexico University ==Private== *Art Center Design College *College of the Southwest *Santa Fe University of Art and Design *St. John's College ==References== * Category:Lists of colleges and universities
